<page title>: Cleverboxes - BDL:K1428V140-UK | Fujitsu P Series Premium P24W-6 (24 inch) IPS LED Display 1000:1 300cd/m2 1920x1200 5ms DisplayPort (UK)
certifications: EN 60950, CE certification according to EC Directive 2004/108/EEC, RoHS, WEEE, IT-Eco-Declaration
description: Optimized and relaxed position - with ergonomic stand featuring height adjust, swivel, tilt and 90° rotation. Highly flexible connectivity through different interfaces - 4 x USB, DisplayPort, HDCP (via DVI-D), DVI and Analog. The abundant screen size of 61 cm (24-inch) provides the professional 16:10 format with 1920 x 1200 pixels for view of 2 x DIN A4 pages side by side. Representative design with space saving front frame and discretely integrated speakers. With DisplayView Manageability tools ready for remote inventory gathering and configuration tasks.
language selection: Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish
